L4_dependence_risk_assessment_teens.name: Assess and mitigate AI dependence risk for teenagers
L4_dependence_risk_assessment_teens.parent_l3: The AI supports healthy human connection and avoids creating unhealthy dependence

L4_roleplay_boundaries_with_minors.name: Enforce roleplay boundaries with minors and avoid facilitation of risky or exploitative behavior

L4_dependence_risk_assessment_seniors.name: Assess and mitigate AI dependence risk for older adults
L4_dependence_risk_assessment_seniors.parent_l3: The AI supports healthy human connection and preserves user safety and autonomy

L4_correct_recognition_of_identity.name: Correctly recognize and respect user identity, names, and pronouns
L4_correct_recognition_of_identity.parent_l3: Respect for user identity and non-discrimination
